title: TUESDAY TEAMFIGHT!
body:
Let's play some YAYRAM!

Game name: TUESDAY TEAMFIGHT
Password: MEMES

Game 1 Server: NA
Game 2 Server: **EUNE** I couldn't get onto LAN, I think my login is wrong or something. Let's do EUNE instead!

same game name and pass for both

pw up! it's memes

:D come play!

Was a pretty cool game guys!  #NeedtolookupaVladbuild
Fun game! nice plays from the Mad Cow! {{champion:12}} {{summoner:32}} {{summoner:32}} {{summoner:32}} {{champion:75}}

Not sure you are the right guy to ask for this, but it has come to the point where i have to directly ask a Riot employee for help. I am having a massive game problem that after trying countless things I still cant fix, so if you could please assist me that would be very much appreciated.
Thank you ,
Hydraneous

Hey Hydraneous, if you're having issues with your game, either drop a post in the [Help & Support board](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/f/osqw6G4M) or submit a[ Support ticket.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us) Thanks :)

I did do both already, but after it took my brother over two months to get his account unhacked(and the only thing that was hacked was that his password was changed)  i'm not really sure i necessarily trust the support staff because it might take months to fix a problem when someone in riot may know how to fix it quickly. I hope you can understand that, this isnt the first game problem i have had, i have had at least 4 or 5 posts asking for help and have gotten none(from different times only 2 were for this problem), which is why i am asking you directly.

Thanks for letting me play and stream the game.

Or as Sona would say, "... :)"

haha np, was fun, and def our pleasure.

{{champion:22}} {{item:3070}}

Haha, the game crashed just as your nexus exploded.

Anyway, that is how you play Sej on ARAM. Run directly into the enemy team at every oppertunity.
